title: The British Landscape: 12,000 years of history
itunes:title: The British Landscape: 12,000 years of history
itunes:subtitle: Nicholas Crane is a geographer, explorer, writer and broadcaster. He has written and presented four notable television series for BBC Two: Coast, Great British Journeys, Map Man and Town.
description:
Nicholas Crane is a geographer, explorer, writer and broadcaster. He has written and presented four notable television series for BBC Two: Coast, Great British Journeys, Map Man and Town. The Making Of The British Landscape: From the Ice Age to the Present is out now.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
